prompts: Create a powerful fire-type Pokemon with a fiery mane and a fierce expression.
I want an impressive Pokemon that embodies the spirit of flames and speed.
Generate a Pokemon with a strong personality that can unleash blazing attacks.
Make a design of a Pokemon that blends flames with fierce determination.
Imagine a creature that roams the mountains, always ready to ignite a battle.
Design a Pokemon with a unique color pattern showcasing its fiery abilities.
Show me a Pokemon that represents the essence of fire in its movements.

distinctive_features: Large mouth with a fierce expression
Slender body with a muscular build
Long tail with fire emanating from it
